name: Stickman Surfboard Sports Race
description:
Explore the greatest ocean tracks as a pro stickman athlete with your windsurf board! Feel the salt ocean wind, catch the wave and have fun with Stickman Surfboard Sports Race!

Join the tournament and leave all other contestants far behind! Become one of the best beach racers ever! Collect every coin to reach the highest speed for your sporty stickman! Play the bright and unusual boat racing game and have fun!

Be careful – stick sharks are ready to attack! Thank the Great Sky Stick, that there are no crocodile, or killer whale here! Be as fast as you can and experience this fantastic feeling of free swimming! Manipulate your sailboard like a pro!

Earn points for every successfully done mission and unlock all the sailboards to play for and tracks to test your skills! Check two game modes – racing mode, where you should beat up all your opponents; and scouting mode, where you’ll be able to scout every corner of the ocean on time!

Feel the water like your comfortable space! Every ocean track has its own interesting obstacles and underwater rocks, so think ahead and have fun playing Stickman Surfboard Sports Race!

Stickman Surfboard Sports Race features:
• Unusual stickman sailboard racing simulator
• Wide range of beautiful and maneuverable sailboards
• Different underwater tracks
• Check two game modes – scouting and racing
